DataElement.preferredName: Miniscrew Temporary Anchorage Device Molar Tooth Uprighting Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A small screw of between 6-14mm in length placed between the roots of a tooth for purposes of anchoring the tooth during orthodonic treatment._A grinding tooth with a broad crown; located behind the premolars._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
